metadata.metaValue:
Credit to MJCG Compounds 2.0 for this compound

This is just a simplied version of 'smooth_geo_property' for smoothing data directly, for situations where the data needs pre/post processing. mesh adjacency nodes are also swapped such that adjacency is only updated if needed.
array<float>, array<Math::float2>, array<Math::float3>, array<Math::float4>, array<double>, array<Math::double2>, array<Math::double3>, array<Math::double4>
Inspired by Paul Smith's mesh smoothing method: https://vimeo.com/454893039
